modName: The Elder Scrolls V - Adolfric Stormhitler
summary: A texture-replacing mod that changes the stormcloaks flags, banners and shields, for the Nazists flags. Also have the non-offensive version without the swastics. Like it, endorse it. Thanks for the support
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys got some news, since many players suggested that the Empire should be the Nazis instead the Stormcloaks, i'm working in a second version of the mod, that will invert the papers, now the empire will be the Nazis. I'm also thinking in turn the Thalmor into the Gestapo, but i'll decide that later. With the second version of the mod, the people will have the option of choosing wich side they prefer to play with the nazi mod. Thank you and don't forget to endorse if you like, and stand by for The Elder Scrolls V: Imperials Reich

*RELEASE: The Elder Scrools V: Imperials Reich - For those who asked for, the same mod, but now the imperials and thalmors are the Natzi. ***For installing this mod, uninstall the Adolfric Stormhitler mod, otherwise, the whole Skyrim will be Natzi-Styled.*** This also is my final natzi-style mod. If you like, endorse/comment please, don't like it, don't download it.

v2.0 - 2.1
*Fixed the Stormcloak factions flags and banners, also their respective guards shield logo:
Winterhold;
Windhelm;
Dawnstar;
Riften.

*2.1 - Fixed flags and banners textures, now is more realistic*
*Nazist swastic replaced by a nazi cross without swastic (less offensive);
*Fixed brightness and saturation of the flags, making them more realistic;
*Removed nazi septim coin;
*Shield logos now with cross instead swastic, but with their city logos under layer and with better textures. (Doesn't looks like plastic anymore)
*I kept the old file with the Swastic for those who liked, but i hope that anyone report it anymore.


v1.0 - 1.1 - 1.2

Changed the Stormcloak factions flags and banners, also their respective guards shield logo:
Winterhold;
Windhelm;
Dawnstar;
Riften.
*Fixed shield inverted logos*
*Flags textures corrected, now is more realistic*
*Changed the Septim coin to a sec. XIX nazist coin. *Removed in 1.1 and 1.2 versions*
*1.1 - Corrected the Star Wars imperial eagle high.*
*1.2 - Star Wars imperial eagle replaced by authentic Nazi eagle.*

Intallation:

Place the data folder to your Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/ folder or
...The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim\data folder if no-steam version.

OBS.: If you're installing any update file or newest file, remove the prevoius files before installing the new version*

Uninstall:

Delete textures\architecture\windhelm\sonsofskyrimfancybanner.dds file
Delete textures\armor\stormcloaks\dawnstarsymbol, riftensymbol, windhelmsymbol, winterholdsymbol .dds's files and their respective (...)_n.dds files too
Delete textures\clutter\citybannerdawnstar01, citybannerriften01, citybannerwinterhold01, civilwarbanners01, .dds files

Issues:
If you have any mod that change the city banners and flags or the shield from the city guards, this mod probably will replace your mods, so make a backup or delete previous mods that you have.

If you like, endorse/comment please, don't like it, don't download it. Thanks for all the guys who have suggested and helped to get the mod nice, thanks too for those who endorsed.

Textures and Images edited by me.
Created by Giovani Paganini - TheGhostNetwork

Thank you all for the support.
author: The Ghost
